overview: A documentary giving information on the game based on the TV show of the same name, about a group of young men who perform painful and outrageous stunts for fun with interviews from Jeff Tremaine, Johnny Knoxville, Bam Margera and the rest of the cast and crew, who relate some of their funnier or more painful experiences with making the game, as well as footage using digital technology to create the game.
title: The Making of 'Jackass: The Game'
